fields.name: The Hobbit:Pocket Edition
fields.description: A great modern classic and the prelude to The Lord of the Rings. This charming pocket-sized edition contains the complete unabridged text and features the original cover illustration, painted by J.R.R. Tolkien himself. The perfect gift for little Hobbits everywhere!

fields.name: Percy Jackson and the Olympians
fields.description: Percy Jackson and the Olympians, Book One: Lightning Thief
